job.title: Senior Data Scientist (Decision Science)
job.description: pAt Retina we enable businesses to tell data stories about their customers We use data science to predict future buying behavior of consumers and recommend actions that businesses can take around those predictions Our founding team has led data science teams at Facebook and Paypal built and sold companies and built the core tech behind several startups We are venturefunded and looking for the next few passionate team members who want the opportunity to transform the worldppbrppThe Decision Sciences pod is a new product development team with the mission to empower better decisioning using customer data We build and sell products that drive actionability for savvy marketers and customer analytics managers Our scientists engineers and designers leverage Retinas trusted CLV scores to design worldclass solutions using optimization theory control theory and machine learningppbrppAs a Senior Data Scientist for Decision Sciences youll be responsible for posing and solving modeling problems for Retinas new wave of products You will own the proof of concept solutions to challenging product research problems You will pose research build and test the teams models and algorithms as well as master all available data sources You will report to the Head of Data as you progress along your career track and work closely with the Decision Sciences Pod Lead to drive company impactppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliTranslate realworld problems into wellposed data science questions with productoriented specificationsliliIdentify models algorithms and approaches that solve problems and meet constraintsliliBuild implement and test your concepts in Jupyter notebooks and Python using real and simulated dataliliDeliver innovative and datadriven results on pace with the teams Sprint cycleliliCollaborate with software developers to write and test packages that execute at scaleliliCollaborate with product to craft an intuitive narrative about our teams competitive advantage and secret sauceliliPrioritize simple correct and effective solutions above complex interesting and riskier ideasliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulli5 years of experience successfully delivering data science projects to stakeholdersliliAdvanced degree in a related field or equivalentliliFamiliarity with at least two of the following AB testing bandits control theory mathematical optimization convex optimization machine learningliliExperience working with engineers and product managers to launch successful software productsliliExperience working with SaaS and knowledge of marketing tech stack productsliliExperience with Python Spark Jupyter Notebooks unit testing or equivalentliulpbrppstrongJoin a team of innovators Heres why youll love working at RetinastrongpullistrongOwnershipstrongliliTake ownership of products client relationships and the trajectory of your role Working in a startup means youre a vital member of a small team  and your work will definitely be noticedlilistrongExciting challengesstrongliliOur product is solving business challenges in new and exciting ways Youll deliver capabilities companies dont even know they need yet and learn amazing things along the waylilistrongInnovationstrongliliYour coworkers will be the type of people who take risks welcome new perspectives and live for great new ideas Learn how to approach problems differently and with agilitylilistrongUnlimited opportunitiesstrongliliEncounter endless opportunities that fall outside of your wheelhouse At Retina you will try out new skills and gain valuable experience that puts you on a career path you lovelilistrongGreat culturestrongliliYou can always rely on your team Our culture is all about learning growing and working together to build something great Find out what its like to work with the bestliulpbrp
